verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, come revive us Bring your breath, and give us life Jesus, send Your word to us Soul and spirit to divide{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, revive us, purify us Living Word, come pierce our hearts Show Your kindness, and lead us To repentance, O God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, purify us By Your Spirit sanctify Jesus, come and change us So our lives reflect Your life{/lang-eng}
